entities.name: gaunts house
entities.description: The Gaunts' house was now more indescribably filthy than anywhere Harry had ever seen.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The teenage Voldemort stood on the threshold, holding an old-fashioned lamp.

entities.name: man
entities.description: A man with hair and beard so overgrown Harry could see neither eyes nor mouth.

relationships.description: Voldemort's eyes moved slowly around the hovel and then found the man in the armchair.
